import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "./ui/card"; import { Button } from "./ui/button"; import { Badge } from "./ui/badge"; import { Input } from "./ui/input"; import { Label } from "./ui/label"; import { Switch } from "./ui/switch"; import { Dialog, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogTrigger, DialogFooter, } from "./ui/dialog"; import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow, } from "./ui/table"; import { Play, Square, Pencil, Trash2, Plus, Video, Activity, Settings2, Server, } from "lucide-react"; import { toast } from "sonner"; interface Camera { id: string; name: string; rtsp_url: string; enabled: boolean; fps_target: number; infer_every_n_frames: number; status: "RUNNING" | "STOPPED"; } const initialCameras: Camera[] = [ { id: "CAM-001", name: "Entrada Principal", rtsp_url: "rtsp://192.168.1.100:554/stream1", enabled: true, fps_target: 30, infer_every_n_frames: 5, status: "RUNNING", }, { id: "CAM-002", name: "Estacionamiento Norte", rtsp_url: "rtsp://192.168.1.101:554/stream1", enabled: true, fps_target: 25, infer_every_n_frames: 10, status: "RUNNING", }, { id: "CAM-003", name: "RecepciÃ³n Principal", rtsp_url: "rtsp://192.168.1.102:554/stream1", enabled: false, fps_target: 30, infer_every_n_frames: 5, status: "STOPPED", }, { id: "CAM-004", name: "Pasillo Norte - Piso 2", rtsp_url: "rtsp://192.168.1.103:554/stream1", enabled: true, fps_target: 30, infer_every_n_frames: 5, status: "RUNNING", }, { id: "CAM-005", name: "Salida de Emergencia", rtsp_url: "rtsp://192.168.1.104:554/stream1", enabled: false, fps_target: 20, infer_every_n_frames: 8, status: "STOPPED", }, { id: "CAM-006", name: "CafeterÃ­a", rtsp_url: "rtsp://192.168.1.105:554/stream1", enabled: true, fps_target: 30, infer_every_n_frames: 5, status: "RUNNING", }, ]; export function Cameras() { const [cameras, setCameras] = useState(initialCameras); const [isDialogOpen, setIsDialogOpen] = useState(false); const [editingCamera, setEditingCamera] = useState(null); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", rtsp_url: "", enabled: true, fps_target: 30, infer_every_n_frames: 5, }); const handleStartStop = (id: string, currentStatus: string) => { setCameras((prev) => prev.map((cam) => cam.id === id ? { ...cam, status: currentStatus === "RUNNING" ? "STOPPED" : ("RUNNING" as "RUNNING" | "STOPPED"), } : cam ) ); toast.success( currentStatus === "RUNNING" ? "ðŸ”´ CÃ¡mara detenida exitosamente" : "ðŸŸ¢ CÃ¡mara iniciada exitosamente" ); }; const handleDelete = (id: string, name: string) => { setCameras((prev) => prev.filter((cam) => cam.id !== id)); toast.success(`ðŸ—‘ï¸ CÃ¡mara "${name}" eliminada exitosamente`); }; const handleEdit = (camera: Camera) => { setEditingCamera(camera); setFormData({ name: camera.name, rtsp_url: camera.rtsp_url, enabled: camera.enabled, fps_target: camera.fps_target, infer_every_n_frames: camera.infer_every_n_frames, }); setIsDialogOpen(true); }; const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); if (editingCamera) { setCameras((prev) => prev.map((cam) => cam.id === editingCamera.id ? { ...cam, ...formData } : cam ) ); toast.success(`âœ… CÃ¡mara "${formData.name}" actualizada exitosamente`); } else { const newCamera: Camera = { id: `CAM-${String(cameras.length + 1).padStart(3, "0")}`, ...formData, status: formData.enabled ? "RUNNING" : "STOPPED", }; setCameras((prev) => [...prev, newCamera]); toast.success(`âœ… CÃ¡mara "${formData.name}" creada exitosamente`); } setIsDialogOpen(false); setEditingCamera(null); setFormData({ name: "", rtsp_url: "", enabled: true, fps_target: 30, infer_every_n_frames: 5, }); }; const openCreateDialog = () => { setEditingCamera(null); setFormData({ name: "", rtsp_url: "", enabled: true, fps_target: 30, infer_every_n_frames: 5, }); setIsDialogOpen(true); }; const runningCameras = cameras.filter((c) => c.status === "RUNNING").length; const stoppedCameras = cameras.filter((c) => c.status === "STOPPED").length; return (
{/* Header */}

GestiÃ³n de CÃ¡maras

setFormData({ ...formData, name: e.target.value }) } placeholder="Ej: Entrada Principal" className="bg-slate-50 border-slate-300 h-11" required />
setFormData({ ...formData, rtsp_url: e.target.value }) } placeholder="rtsp://192.168.1.100:554/stream1" className="bg-slate-50 border-slate-300 font-mono text-sm h-11" required />

Ingresa la URL del stream RTSP de la cÃ¡mara IP
